column3: Register and onboard partner ISPs to the platform
Collect QoS metrics from ISPs via API/SNMP
End-user speed test via mobile/web app

column5: ISP uploads required documents (NID license etc)
BTRC admin approves or rejects application
System verifies NID via external API
System generates API credentials for approved ISP
ISP configures API keys in their system
End user views past test results
